===== What falls within the scope of psychotherapy=====
- The majority of psychiatric disorders & certain non-psychiatric disorders (e.g. chronic pain, functional neurological disorders, etc.)

- Alone or in conjunction with pharmacotherapy and social therapy

Favourable factors :

- Patient commitment/request

- Quality therapeutic alliance

- Therapist empathy

- Specific, validated psychotherapeutic tools

- Setting: therapeutic objective, duration

question.title: What falls within the scope of psychotherapy?

option_a.title: The majority of psychiatric disorders & certain non-psychiatric disorders (e.g. chronic pain, functional neurological disorders, etc.)
option_a.description: This is a plausible answer, but not entirely accurate

option_b.title: Alone or in conjunction with pharmacotherapy and social therapy
option_b.description: This is a common misconception about psychotherapy

option_c.title: Favourable factors such as patient commitment/request, quality therapeutic alliance, therapist empathy, specific, validated psychotherapeutic tools, and setting: therapeutic objective, duration
option_c.description: This option is a mix of correct and incorrect information

option_d.title: Recognised scientific theory, Clearly established indications, Codified technique, Trained and competent staff, Evaluable effects, Caregiver-patient relationship based on respect & empathy
